definition: to patrol/to make one's rounds/classifier for rounds of drinks

sentences.english: Troopers were asked to return tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 巡警明天会应要请再来。

sentences.english: Which is how I got pulled over by a highway patrolman.
sentences.chinese: 有一次我就因为超速度行驶被一个公路巡警拦了下来。

sentences.english: Think how could the flatfoot on duty bear such a cold.
sentences.chinese: 想想那值勤的巡警怎么受得了这么冷的天。

sentences.english: We must uphold morale of the police officers and build a good image.
sentences.chinese: 规范巡警的警容风纪，树立良好形象。

sentences.english: The establishment of the patrolman system at the end of the Qing Dynasty caused the process of Chinese police modernization.
sentences.chinese: 清末巡警制度的创立是中国警察近代化的开始。

sentences.english: These regulations shall apply to the patrol done by patrolmen on duty.
sentences.chinese: 巡警的巡察工作适用本条例。

sentences.english: Traffic police and highway patrolmen patrol all roads to see if the traffic is in order.
sentences.chinese: 交警和公路巡警在路上巡逻维持秩序。

sentences.english: The policeman came up to me, and said, "Get another rickshaw. He can't pull you any more."
sentences.chinese: 巡警走近我说，“你自己雇车罢，他不能拉你了。”

sentences.english: As the patrolmen approached the object, it manoeuvred through the trees and disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 作为巡警走近物体，它操纵通过树木和消失。

sentences.english: The driver complained that the patrolmen were not papering enough.
sentences.chinese: 司机抱怨说巡警不曾发出足够的交通违章传票。

sentences.english: I was just endorsed. 7,500 patrol agents.
The State Trooper asked, frowning at me through my car window.
sentences.chinese: 高速公路巡警通过我的车窗皱着眉头问我。

sentences.english: The policeman came up to me and said, "Get another rickshaw. He can't take you any further."
sentences.chinese: 巡警走近我说，“你自己雇车罢，他不能拉你了。”

sentences.english: Patrolman Jones is at the scene of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 巡警琼斯曾在出事现场。

sentences.english: He took a squad car and a sidearm off a highway patrolman.
sentences.chinese: 他夺走了高速公路巡警的车和手枪。

sentences.english: This is the first time that the Qingyuan police station has held an English Corner learning activity.
sentences.chinese: 这是清原县巡警大队开办的第一次英语角活动。

definition: SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
variant of 執勤|执勤[zhi2 qin2]
civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
